sentences.literal: Issued teachings within borders, Ba people sent tribute;
sentences.idiomatic: He issued teachings within the borders, and the Ba people sent tribute;

sentences.literal: Extended virtue to feudal lords, eight Rong came submit.
sentences.idiomatic: He extended virtue to the feudal lords, and the eight Rong tribes came to submit.

sentences.literal: You Yu heard of it, knocked border requested see.
sentences.idiomatic: You Yu heard of it and knocked on the border gate requesting an audience.

sentences.chinese: 五羖大夫之相秦也，勞不坐乘，暑不張蓋，行於國中，不從車乘，不操干戈，功名藏於府庫，德行施於後世。
sentences.literal: Five Ram Skin Grand Master chancellor Qin, toil not ride carriage, heat not spread canopy, walked in state, not follow carriages, not grasp spear halberd, merit name stored in treasuries, virtue conduct applied to later generations.

sentences.chinese: 五羖大夫死，秦國男女流涕，童子不歌謠，舂者不相杵。
sentences.literal: Five Ram Skin Grand Master died, Qin state males females flowed tears, children not sing songs, pestle not pound.
This Five Ram Skin Grand Master virtue.

sentences.chinese: 今君之見秦王也，因嬖人景監以為主，非所以為名也。
sentences.literal: Now Your Lordship see Qin king, through favored person Jing Jian as master, not way to make name.

sentences.chinese: 相秦不以百姓為事，而大筑冀闕，非所以為功也。
sentences.literal: Chancellor Qin not take hundred families as affairs, greatly build Ji Que, not way to make merit.

sentences.chinese: 刑黥太子之師傅，殘傷民以駿刑，是積怨畜禍也。
sentences.literal: Punish tattoo crown prince tutors, injure people with harsh punishments, this accumulate resentment store calamity.

sentences.chinese: 教之化民也深於命，民之效上也捷於令。
sentences.literal: Teach transform people deeper than commands, people serve superiors swifter than orders.

sentences.chinese: 今君又左建外易，非所以為教也。
sentences.literal: Now Your Lordship again left establish external change, not way to teach.

sentences.chinese: 君又南面而稱寡人，日繩秦之貴公子。
sentences.literal: Your Lordship again face south call solitary person, daily restrain Qin noble sons.

sentences.chinese: 《詩》曰：『相鼠有體，人而無禮，人而無禮，何不遄死。』
sentences.literal: Poetry says: Rat has body, person without ritual, person without ritual, why not quickly die.

sentences.chinese: 以詩觀之，非所以為壽也。
sentences.literal: Observe with poetry, not way for longevity.

sentences.chinese: 公子虔杜門不出已八年矣，君又殺祝懽而黥公孫賈。
sentences.literal: Gongzi Qian closed door not go out already eight years, Your Lordship again kill Zhu Huan tattoo Gongsun Jia.
